name: .ZVF
summary: Learn about .ZVF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a ZVF file with Hexagon Intergraph Smart Review (Windows), to view the 3D models it contains. To do so:
Select File â†’ Open from Smart Review's menu bar.
Navigate to and open your ZVF file.
In the Create Project window, click OK.
In the Load View Files window, select the VUE files you want to load.
Smart Review will then display the VUE files you selected.
